marytts.modules

Class PronunciationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.modules.InternalModule
      • marytts.modules.PronunciationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MaryModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Postlex, Postlex, PronunciationModel

    public class PronunciationModel
extends InternalModule
    This module serves as a post-lexical pronunciation model. Its appropriate place in the module chain is after intonisation. The target features are taken and fed into decision trees that predict the new pronunciation. A new mary xml is output, with the difference being that the old pronunciation is replaced by the newly predicted one, and a finer grained xml structure.
    Author:
    ben

                                   AllophoneSet allophoneSet)

        Parameters:
